settings.title: stay strong. stay safe.
settings.text: These are trying times for every single person on our planet.  This is an opportunity for us to enact the change we seek in ourselves and help others to live a healthier and happier life.  Learn more about Movement Made Happy.
‚ÄúI felt unmistakably calm but present, like this route I‚Äôd completed a hundred times before was somehow more beautiful than ever.‚Äù
It has never been safer, cleaner, and more fun for people to find something that works for them.  Here are a few tips for those trying to stay active with the help of a few magical cannabinoids.
I Ran My First Marathon High
settings.sub: For over three months, I trained six days a week in preparation for the Los Angeles Marathon. It didn‚Äôt prepare me.

settings.text: The Runner's High
settings.sub: Advancements in research point to the endocannabinoid system as the cause for giving endurance athletes that euphoric feeling.

settings.text: A cannabis guide for everyday athletes.
settings.sub: Tips to get you moving happy.

settings.text: How can CBD improve my running?
settings.sub: Getting over the hump with hemp.

settings.text: Chasing the High
settings.sub: A personal recount of running for people that hate running.

settings.title: Self-care is a right, not a privilege.
settings.text: We want to create a world where everyone has the access and ability to enjoy the benefits of an open mind and active life. Yet the inequities that permeate our society are deeply present in our ability to care for ourselves. From access to the great outdoors to feeling safe where we exercise. The problems are vast. Our aim is simple. More movement. More happiness. More often. For all.

settings.title: Every community is a happy community.
settings.text: It‚Äôs our obligation to champion healthy communities starting by repairing the damage caused by the war on drugs. Too many have been destroyed and by non-violent cannabis incarceration. We simply can‚Äôt move on and forget. The consequences caused by these criminal records have included barriers to employment, housing, voting rights, public benefits, and other vital services that contribute to systemic community burnout. We support The Last Prisoner Project, currently with 1% of revenue, to free the incarcerated and expunge criminal records. Equally, we encourage state and federal regulations, like the MORE act, that legalize cannabis while creating reform and repair for the damage the war on drugs has reaped. So that all of us may enjoy active and healthy lives.

settings.title: Our world is powered by sustainable innovation, not synthetic exploitation.
settings.text: Our planet is on the verge of burnout. The ravages of climate change, pollution, and waste are taking away our home field. To ensure a future where everyday athletes have a place to play, we are committed to sustainability from farm-to-fitness and the preservation of open spaces, parks, and land. We‚Äôve sourced our cannabis sustainability, minimized our packing using sustainable materials, and are exploring new ways of minimizing our impact like the use of closed-loop shipping.

settings.hero_text: We believe an open mind and an active life is a better prescription for self-care.
settings.split_text: We believe that honesty, compassion and empathy is good business. We‚Äôve laid out a holistic vision for OFFFIELD that ensures that as we grow we create meaningful impact. Goals that will take a lifetime to accomplish but worth the journey. We fund these goals by allocating 1% of revenue into initiatives for People, Places and Planet, and by growing our company in their service.
settings.blm_text: For too long, the war on drugs led to the dismantling of communities of color. While cannabis dispensaries have been deemed essential in many states, tens of thousands of people remain in prison for their participation in  cannabis culture. OFFFIELD is committed to change. Throughout 2022, we are allocating 1% of revenue to advance cannabis reform, so every stick we sell sticks it to injustice.
settings.movement_text:
Based in Los Angeles, California, OFFFIELD is committed to providing organic solutions for self-care through cannabis research and products.

If you‚Äôre interested in joining our team, shoot us an email to work@offfield.com for full-time, part time or freelance opportunities.

settings.title: cbd & cbg
settings.content: This non-psychoactive blend of broad spectrum CBD and CBG, selected for quality and effect, works together to help you keep moving and feeling awesome. This is the good stuff. The cheeba. Formulated to be easy to dissolve in water with a subtle hint of lime.

settings.title: l-theanine
settings.content: L-Theanine is an incredible tea leaf derived energy boost without the jitteriness of caffeine. It‚Äôs the thrill of winning, without the pressure of competing.

settings.title: vitamin b12
settings.content: B12 is an essential vitamin that your body needs but can‚Äôt produce. Vital to creating red blood cells, B12 enhances oxygen delivery, energy production, and fights fatigue.

settings.title: low sugar
settings.content: Unlike other health products, sugar is necessary to achieve optimal hydration through osmosis. Our team worked to develop a formula that balances the natural bitterness of CBD with the lowest amount of sugar and sodium needed for an enduring activity. With only 6g of natural cane sugar per stick pack (much less than other hydration products such as Gatorade, 34g of sugar) and no hidden sugar substitutes like stevia and no monk fruit, everyday athletes will know exactly what they‚Äôre putting in their bodies allowing them to make the most of their next activity.

settings.title: hydration with benefits
settings.content:
Fights inflammation and mental fatigue

Alleviates anxiety and improves energy

Hydrates 2x faster than water alone

Way less sugar than other sports drinks

Powerful essential minerals you need

settings.title: plant enhanced biometrics
settings.content: We use Plant Enhanced Biometrics (PEB) to develop each of our formulations. Through a patented micro-encapsulation system, our water dispersible formula contains the highest quality CBD and CBG that mixes evenly. Sourcing the highest quality plants and minerals allows your mind to feel calm and your body to stay active.

settings.title: accessing the runner's high
settings.content: OFFFIELD uses broad spectrum CBD & CBG to access your Endocannabinoid System (ECS) with no psychoactive THC. Activation of the ECS has been linked to the runner's high, triggered during high endurance exercise.

settings.title: plant based science
settings.content: Only in the last decade has modern-day science been allowed to touch the glorious cannabis plant. Their findings are the bedrock of our formulations.

settings.title: Runner's High
settings.content: The Runner‚Äôs High is a bragging right amongst runners, yet how it worked remained a mystery to scientists for generations. With the legalization of cannabis research came the discovery of the source of the Runner‚Äôs High. The Endocannabinoid System induces and regulates exercise highs for just about any activity. The same Endocannabinoid System that is activated with cannabinoids like CBD and CBG.

settings.title: HOW IT WORKS
settings.content:
In 1992 Scientist Raphael Mechoulam discovered the Endocannabinoid System. Receptors that manage our well-being, including mood, pain, sleep, and immune functions.

These same CB1 and CB2 receptors also activate when plant cannabinoids are introduced to your body, becoming a plant based solution for managing inflammation, anxiety, and mood.

settings.title: Hydration
settings.content:
When has anyone every said, ‚ÄúI wish I was less hydrated.‚Äù 
Hydration drinks like OFFFIELD make it easy to supplement the vitamins and minerals we all need when getting active. Anything that makes you sweat, even cleaning the house or jumping on the bed, means rehydrating is a good idea. And it tastes great too!

settings.title: Testing
settings.content:
We test all of our products to make sure that you get the best and safest quality ingredients. Not only do we do it because we care, but also because it is required by law. Which we‚Äôre totally cool with:

Download Results for Original Lime Enhanced Hydration

Download Results for Dragon Fruit Lemonade Enhanced Hydration

settings.ingredient_description: Selected for quality and effect, these phytocannabinoids work together to help you keep moving and feeling awesome.
Yerba Mate comes from naturally caffeinated leaves found in South American rainforest, know to increase mental energy and focus.
When you need long lasting energy, carbohydrates will fuel you quickly and help you last longer. That sounded way more sexual than expected. But probably works for that too.
Naturally flavored with Elderberry and Raspberry, superfruits know for their natural vitamins, amino acids, and antioxidants, prover to boost mental health and good for your heart.

settings.product_detail: As our inaugural Offfield LabsTM project, we're excited to make a CBD gummy with everyday athletes in mind, developed together, and made for you. This isn't an ordinary CBD gummy, this is an enhanced performance gummy.
settings.challenge_desc:
Sometimes you need a portable source of energy to help you keep moving. Our gummies are packed with easily digestible carbohydrates to help your muscles re-energize. Key nutrients, vitamins, electrolytes and amino acids to maintain your mojo. And cannabinoids to help get your vibe up and inflammation down.

The inspiration for our first enhanced performance gummy came from friends and customers asking for a high quality product similar to our enhanced hydration, but without the liquid. Many endurance athletes prefer to run on a empty stomach, but still need the electrolytes, vitamins, minerals, and anti-inflammatory cannabinoids to help them perform their best.

settings.offfield_desc:
Testing high quality products at the intersection of cannabis research and performance science. Always with everyday athletes like you in mind.

Limited Edition, pre-release products.

Exclusively priced and made for you.


By participating in Offfield Labs, you have the opportunity of making something people love, and a chance to receive the finished product once it's ready at no additional cost. All we ask of you is your honesty, kindness, and support.
settings.product_ingredients_title:
quality ingredients
for a quality experience
settings.popup_labs_description:
Innovation In Public

Transparent in our process and our values. We test all of our products rigorously before making them available for Offfield Labs. We only make a very limited quantity so that we can improve on the formula with the help of everyday athletes, like you.


Eliminates Waste

The worst possible life-cycle of a product is sitting on a shelf, unwanted, unused, and ultimately thrown away. Labs allows us to innovate without creating waste (for our business and the environment), by starting small (or not making it at all if you‚Äôre not into it).


Really Real Feedback

We want help from real people doing their best to keep happy and healthy, so that we can deliver the best. If you love what we‚Äôre making, awesome! Let‚Äôs make it for real. If you don‚Äôt, all good! That‚Äôs what this is all about.

All Labs Products Are Tested & Certified in Development with Doctors, Specialists and Athletes.

settings.ingredient_description: Selected for quality and effect, these phytocannabinoids work together to help you keep moving and feeling awesome.
This is the strong stuff. We're not messing around here. Lidocaine is an anesthetic that prevents pain by blocking the signals at the nerve endings on skin.
Smells like pain relief! Menthol is an organic compound has both anesthetic and counterirritant qualities.

settings.product_detail: We're excited to make a roll-on designed to work fast without all the mess. This Enhanced Recovery Roll-On is a strong starting point for a better approach to targeted pain relief. Together we‚Äôll take it to a whole new level.
settings.challenge_desc:
Let‚Äôs face it, we all get sore. Muscles that ache. Ailments that flare-up. Joints that need love. What we hear from you all is how a little relief can go a long way. This roll-on is designed for you to put it where it hurts, for that well-earned relief. 

Designed to deliver targeted relief with 500mg CBD + 4% Lidocaine + 1% Menthol. These active ingredients sit at the intersection of our product philosophy. Combining the latest in cannabinoid research with impactful sports science.

With the legalization of cannabis research came the discovery of the source of the Runner‚Äôs High. The Endocannabinoid System induces and regulates exercise highs for just about any activity. The same Endocannabinoid System that is activated with cannabinoids like CBD and CBG.

settings.title: HOW IT WORKS
settings.content:
In 1992 Scientist Raphael Mechoulam discovered the Endocannabinoid System. Receptors that manage our well-being, including mood, pain, sleep, and immune functions.

These same CB1 and CB2 receptors also activate when plant cannabinoids are introduced to your body, becoming a plant based solution for managing inflammation, anxiety, and mood.
